thread.section_title: The Chatwal, A Luxury Collection Hotel, New York - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Absolutely Awesome
thread.title_full: Absolutely Awesome - Review of The Chatwal, A Luxury Collection Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Carlos B
title: Absolutely Awesome
text:
Great place to stay in NY, very well located and friendly staff.
As SPG Platinum, we received an upgrade to a suite vary spacious and amazingly decorated. Bathroom is outstanding!
The Lambs Club is an excellent place to dine and Jazz sessions on Saturday are a must...
Highly recommended.
